CustomField.description: The grid size (number between 1 and 12) specified by the Classes field
CustomField.formula: IF ( LEFT( Classes__c , 7 ) = "col-md-" && ISNUMBER(RIGHT(Classes__c, LEN(Classes__c) - 7)), VALUE(RIGHT(Classes__c, LEN(Classes__c) - 7)), 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The grid size (number between 1 and 12) specified by the Classes field
CustomField.label: Grid size
